title: Sketches on the River near Morlaix: (a) Buildings with Steps; (b) A Bend in the River where St-François-de-Cuburien Can Just Be Glimpsed; (c) A Closer View of St-François-de-Cuburien; (d) A Bend in the River Leading to a Building
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
